plugin.name: ZombieMUD_BuffTracker_Enhanced
plugin.author: Enhanced by Claude
plugin.purpose: Track buffs with uptime and announce to party
plugin.description:
Enhanced buff tracker for ZombieMUD with uptime tracking.
- Alias: buffs (prints current buff stacks with uptime to party channel) - Tracks individual buff uptime - Announces total uptime when buff expires - Omits stack info for single-stack buffs - Expanded buff list from effects.tf - Berserk ignore counter: Announces total ignored attacks to party on creature death - Calm alias: Manually end berserk with ignore count announcement

trigger.match: A seering pain shoots through your body, but you ignore it.
You feel the red mist fading away.
